Symbol.Script_UI:
!iTrussType TRUSS_BOWSTRING = 1 TRUSS_PITCHED_COMPLEX = 2 TRUSS_FLAT_HOWE = 3 TRUSS_FLAT_PRATT = 4 TRUSS_PITCHED_HOWE = 5 TRUSS_PITCHED_PRATT = 6 TRUSS_SAWTOOTH = 7 TRUSS_SCISSORS = 8 TRUSS_WARREN = 9 TRUSS_PITCHED_FINK = 10
! iEndType END_PERPENDICULAR = 1 END_VERTICAL = 2 END_HORIZONTAL = 3 END_RECTANGULAR = 4 END_CUSTOM_CUT = 5
! ============================================================================== ! Definitions ! ==============================================================================
!ac_symb_display_option DISPLAY_PROJECTED = 1 DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ = 2 DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC = 3 DISPLAY_OUTLINES = 4 DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL = 5
!ac_symb_show_projection_to PROJECTION_FLOOR_PLAN_RANGE = 1 PROJECTION_DISPLAY_LIMIT = 2 PROJECTION_ENTIRE_ELEMENT = 3
! ============================================================================== ! Localization ! ============================================================================== dim stDisplayOptions[5] stDisplayOptions[1] = `Сечение и Низ` stDisplayOptions[2] = `Сечение и Верх` stDisplayOptions[3] = `Символический Вид` stDisplayOptions[4] = `Только Контуры` stDisplayOptions[5] = `Вся Проекция`
dim stProjectionTypes[3] stProjectionTypes[1] = `Согласно Диапазону Плана Этажа` stProjectionTypes[2] = `Согласно Абсолютному Диапазону` stProjectionTypes[3] = `Весь Элемент`
dim st3dDetLevelValues[3] st3dDetLevelValues[1] = `Детальный` st3dDetLevelValues[2] = `Простой` st3dDetLevelValues[3] = `Откл.`
! ============================================================================= ! Tabpage Structure Definition ! =============================================================================
TABID_ROOT = -1 _idxTab = 1 TABID_REPRES = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1 TABID_DESCRIPTIONS = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1
! ============================================================================= ! Display actual tabpages ! =============================================================================
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
ui_page TABID_REPRES, TABID_ROOT, `Аксессуары, Отображение и Покрытия`, "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" gosub "AppearancePage"
ui_page TABID_DESCRIPTIONS, TABID_ROOT, `Характеристики`, "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)" gosub "descriptionPage"
n = REQUEST ("Working_length_unit", "", workingLengthUnit)
!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Image links for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
! ============================================================================= end ! =============================================================================
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Subroutines ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"AppearancePage": listfieldID = TABID_REPRES ui_listfield listfieldID , 0, 0, 444, 265, 1, "", ""
if iTrussType = TRUSS_PITCHED_COMPLEX |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_PITCHED_HOWE |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_PITCHED_PRATT |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_PITCHED_FINK then
listItemID = 1
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "", 0, "", `Детали` ! Group line listItemID = listItemID + 1 childFlag = 1
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "tieBeamLength", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 if (iTrussType <> TRUSS_PITCHED_COMPLEX) then ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "wn", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "stp", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "iEndType", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "bOverhang", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "eaveOverhang", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "eaveHeight", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 if (iEndType = END_CUSTOM_CUT) | (iEndType = END_RECTANGULAR) then ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "cutPartLength", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif if (iEndType = END_CUSTOM_CUT) then ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "topFlangeAngle", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "bottomFlangeAngle", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 2 endif ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "rafterHeight", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "tieBeamHeight", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "webBeamHeight", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "iDimensionSetMode", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "trussHeight", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ang", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "rp", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_SAWTOOTH then listItemID = 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "tieBeamLength", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "nn", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "numDivisions", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ced", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "stp", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "eaveOverhang", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "crh", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "iDimensionSetMode", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ang", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "rp", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_SCISSORS then listItemID = 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "tieBeamLength", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "wn", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ced", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "stp", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "eaveOverhang", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "crh", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "iDimensionSetMode", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ang", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "rp", 0, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_BOWSTRING |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_FLAT_HOWE |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_FLAT_PRATT |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_WARREN then
firstItemID = 1 ui_listitem firstItemID, listfieldID, "", 0, "", `Аксессуары` ! Group line listItemID = firstItemID + 1 childFlag = 1
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "stp", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1
if iTrussType = TRUSS_BOWSTRING | iTrussType = TRUSS_SCISSORS then
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "wn", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_WARREN |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_FLAT_HOWE | iTrussType = TRUSS_FLAT_PRATT then
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "nn", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_BOWSTRING |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_SCISSORS then
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ced", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_BOWSTRING | iTrussType = TRUSS_FLAT_HOWE |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_FLAT_PRATT |\ iTrussType = TRUSS_SCISSORS | iTrussType = TRUSS_WARREN then
ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "crh", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_SCISSORS then ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "iDimensionSetMode", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 1 endif
if iTrussType = TRUSS_SCISSORS then ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "ang", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 ui_listitem listItemID, listfieldID, "rp", childFlag, "" : listItemID = listItemID + 1 else listItemID = listItemID + 2 endif endif
dim st2DParamNames[][] st2DParamNames[1][1] = "ac_symb_display_option" : st2DParamNames[1][2] = "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[2][1] = "ac_symb_show_projection_to" : st2DParamNames[2][2] = "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[3][1] = "std" : st2DParamNames[3][2] = "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[4][1] = "gs_axis" : st2DParamNames[4][2] = "ui_list_axis2D_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[5][1] = "gs_axis_line" : st2DParamNames[5][2] = "ui_list_axisLineType_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[6][1] = "gs_axis_line_pen" : st2DParamNames[6][2] = "ui_list_axisLinePen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[7][1] = "gs_cont_line" : st2DParamNames[7][2] = "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)"
st2DParamNames[8][1] = "gs_cont_pen" : st2DParamNames[8][2] = "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[9][1] = "gs_fill_type" : st2DParamNames[9][2] = "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[10][1] = "gs_fill_pen" : st2DParamNames[10][2] = "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[11][1] = "gs_back_pen" : st2DParamNames[11][2] = "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)"
st2DParamNames[12][1] = "gs_cut_linetype" : st2DParamNames[12][2] = "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[13][1] = "gs_cut_pen" : st2DParamNames[13][2] = "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[14][1] = "gs_cut_fill_type" : st2DParamNames[14][2] = "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[15][1] = "gs_cut_fill_pen" : st2DParamNames[15][2] = "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[16][1] = "gs_cut_back_pen" : st2DParamNames[16][2] = "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[17][1] = "gs_overhead_linetype" : st2DParamNames[17][2] = "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[18][1] = "gs_overhead_pen" : st2DParamNames[18][2] = "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)"
dim st3DParamNames[][] i = 1 st3DParamNames[i][1] = "gs_detlevel_3D_m" : st3DParamNames[i][2] = "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" : i = i + 1 if iTrussType # TRUSS_FLAT_HOWE &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_PITCHED_FINK &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_FLAT_PRATT &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_PITCHED_COMPLEX &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_PITCHED_HOWE &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_PITCHED_PRATT &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_SAWTOOTH &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_SCISSORS &\ iTrussType # TRUSS_WARREN then st3DParamNames[i][1] = "gs_resol" : st3DParamNames[i][2] = "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" : i = i + 1 endif st3DParamNames[i][1] = "gs_shadow" : st3DParamNames[i][2] = "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" : i = i + 1 st3DParamNames[i][1] = "gs_pen_3d" : st3DParamNames[i][2] = "ui_list_3DPen_flat(1)" : i = i + 1
dim stSurfaceParamNames[][] stSurfaceParamNames[1][1] = "gs_truss_mat" : stSurfaceParamNames[1][2] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" stSurfaceParamNames[2][1] = "mat2" : stSurfaceParamNames[2][2] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)"
call "ui_structure_Representation" parameters all bDrawField = 0, bDraw2DGroupList = 1, listfieldID = TABID_REPRES, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", st2DParamNames = st2DParamNames, st3DParamNames = st3DParamNames, stSurfaceParamNames = stSurfaceParamNames
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! image list for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_axis2D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_axisLineType_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_axisLinePen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_3DPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_surface_flat(1)"
return
"descriptionPage":
dim stParamNames[16] stParamNames[1] = "gs_list_cost" stParamNames[2] = "gs_list_manufacturer" stParamNames[3] = "gs_list_note" stParamNames[4] = "gs_list_location" stParamNames[5] = "gs_list_accessories" stParamNames[6] = "FM_Type" stParamNames[7] = "FM_InventoryNumber" stParamNames[8] = "FM_SerialNumber" stParamNames[9] = "FM_ProductionYear" stParamNames[10] = "FM_ObjectWeight" stParamNames[11] = "FM_ObjectWeightUnit" stParamNames[12] = "gs_list_custom1" stParamNames[13] = "gs_list_custom2" stParamNames[14] = "gs_list_custom3" stParamNames[15] = "gs_list_custom4" stParamNames[16] = "gs_list_custom5"
call "ui_object_listing" parameters all listfieldID = TABID_DESCRIPTIONS, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", stParamNames = stParamNames return
Symbol.Comment: Bowstring wood truss with optional division number and end cut.
